AUTHOR ’S NOTE :

Warning : This contains spoilers for the first four books in the series .

Welcome back to [Salacious Players ’ Club]142-salacious players ’ club !

It ’s been a while since [we]143-we ’ve stepped foot in [the club]144-the club , so here ’s a quick refresher on what ’s been happening with [[your]124-you favorite kinky characters]145-your favorite kinky characters . [Highest Bidder]31-highest bidder picks up two years after the beginning of Praise . [Charlotte]32-charlotte is now [Mrs. Grant]33-mrs. grant , and [[her]32-charlotte ex - beau]146-her ex - beau , [Beau]34-beau , is now in [Phoenix]2-phoenix , running [a club of [his]146-her ex - beau own]147-a club of his own with [[his]146-her ex - beau new Madame]148-his new madame , [Maggie]35-daisy . [Our]143-we favorite throuple , [Drake]36-drake , [Isabel]37-isabel , and [Hunter]38-hunter are now the proud parents of [twin girls , and almost ready to start trying for a third]149-twin girls , and almost ready to start trying for a third . [Garrett]39-garrett and [Mia]40-mia are happily engaged with plans for a fall wedding at [the lake]150-the lake later this year . Things have been quiet around [the club]144-the club lately , leading [the wealthiest member]152-the wealthiest member to find a little trouble of [his]152-the wealthiest member own …

Content warnings :

As always , this story will have some intense themes [I]0-i ’d like [you]153-you to be aware of before embarking on this journey with [the characters]154-the characters . There is a heavy emphasis on grief , parental loss , as well as child loss . There is also healing , recovery , and remembrance . Rest assured that [I]0-i would never write the sad parts without the happy parts . Grief and joy coexist .

Much love , [[my]0-i readers]155-my readers . Enjoy .

Love , [Sara]29-sara cate

* * *

RULE # 40 : BIG RISK , BIG REWARD

Daisy Two months later

There ’s this part of grief counseling where [we]1810-we ’re supposed to sit in silence for a few moments . It ’s meant to be meditative and calming . For five minutes , [we]1810-we listen to nothing , and it allows [us]1810-we to just focus inward . It ’s [my]0-i least favorite part . It feels like being shut alone in [a room]2333-a room with [someone [I]0-i ’ve been avoiding]1812-someone i ’ve been avoiding . Painful and awkward and torturous . But [I]0-i do it . Because that was the promise [I]0-i made [myself]0-i . [I]0-i ’m not going to cut corners and fake recovery . [I]0-i am going to do the hard things . Big risk , big reward . The five - minute timer beeps and [everyone]128-everyone slowly opens [their]128-everyone eyes . Another least favorite of mine . Staring into the grief - stricken faces of [survivors]1814-survivors , like [me]0-i . But it turns out convincing [yourself]1815-yourself that [someone else]1114-someone else has it worse does n’t actually make [you]1815-yourself feel better . Because sadness is just … all around . And [I]0-i do n’t mean in just these meetings , but everywhere . [No one]194-no one is really immune or safe from sadness . [No one]194-no one has perfect , poetic lives . It took [me]0-i having one for a split second to realize that . Even on [private jets and balconies overlooking [the Eiffel Tower]1820-the eiffel tower]1819-private jets and balconies overlooking the eiffel tower , the grief and pain [I]0-i ’d been bottling up and shoving into a ratty old backpack stuck to [me]0-i like static cling . But [I]0-i also learned , through these harrowing and sometimes overwhelmingly sad meetings , that while sadness does permeate the air nearly everywhere , so does joy . Ironically , it turns out that that ’s sort of what makes life poetic in the first place . It ’s not an Instagram filter or a Pinterest board . It ’s gross and gritty and beautiful and stunning all at the same time . [I]0-i also had to accept that love could be just a memory , and it would n’t make it any less perfect or significant . [[My]0-i mother]199-my mother loved [me]0-i so much , [she]199-my mother walked away from [the man of [her]199-my mother dreams]1822-the man of her dreams . [She]199-my mother walked away from real love . But [she]199-my mother came back [a happy woman]1823-a happy woman . Without thinking about the gross parts , of course . [I]0-i love that [her]199-my mother heart beat for [the same person [mine]0-i did]1827-the same person mine did , and that means something . Like [she]199-my mother ’s still here . [I]0-i ’ve let go of [Ronan Kade]42-ronan . [I]0-i do n’t cry about it anymore . At least not every day , like in the beginning .
